language.item: Please select one of the categories below.
The description should be at least 3 characters long.
With this module you are able to administer the downloads.
Please select whether you want to allow comments under downloads or not.
Please select a category where do you want to find the download.
Please select the path to the file you want to upload.
Please type in the external resource for the file.
The title should be at least 3 characters long.
